snippet: James Cameron is opening a production company in China to focus on 3-D films. While the format is floundering in Europe and the United States, it's all the rage in China, where paying premium prices - for a 3-D movie ticket, the latest Chanel handbag...
abstract: James Cameron is opening a production company in China to focus on 3-D films. While the format is floundering in Europe and the United States, it's all the rage in China, where paying premium prices - for a 3-D movie ticket, the latest Chanel handbag or a new Ferrari - is the whole point.

headline.main: Hollywood's Great 3-D Leap Forward Into China
